thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Wednesday, 17 Jan 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-CMS Announces Additional Enrollment Periods To Help People Impacted By Hurricanes In Puerto Rico, U.S. Virgin Islands

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-CMS Announces Additional Enrollment Periods To Help People Impacted By Hurricanes In Puerto Rico, U.S. Virgin Islands

organizations.name: reuters) - centers for medicare & medicaid services

text:
Jan 17 (Reuters) - Centers for Medicare & Medicaid Services:
* CMS ANNOUNCES ADDITIONAL SPECIAL ENROLLMENT PERIODS TO HELP INDIVIDUALS IMPACTED BY HURRICANES IN PUERTO RICO AND THE U.S. VIRGIN ISLANDS
* CENTERS FOR MEDICARE & MEDICAID SERVICES SAYS SPECIAL ENROLLMENT PERIOD OPPORTUNITIES EXTENDED THROUGH MARCH 31, 2018 Source text: ( go.cms.gov/2EPXrtn )
